<h3 id="langgraph_sdk.auth.exceptions.HTTPException" class="doc doc-heading">
<code class="doc-symbol doc-symbol-heading doc-symbol-class"></code>            <span class="doc doc-object-name doc-class-name">HTTPException</span>


<a href="#langgraph_sdk.auth.exceptions.HTTPException" class="headerlink" title="Copy anchor link to this section for reference">&para;</a></h3>


    <div class="doc doc-contents ">
            <p class="doc doc-class-bases">
              Bases: <code><a class="autorefs autorefs-external" href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/exceptions.html#Exception" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Exception</a></code></p>



        <p>HTTP exception that you can raise to return a specific HTTP error response.</p>
<p>Since this is defined in the auth module, we default to a 401 status code.</p>


<table>
      <thead>
        <tr>
          <th><span class="doc-section-title">PARAMETER</span></th>
          <th><span>DESCRIPTION</span></th>
        </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody>
          <tr class="doc-section-item">
            <td>
                <code>status_code</code>
            </td>
            <td class="doc-param-details">
              <div class="doc-md-description">
                <p>HTTP status code for the error. Defaults to 401 "Unauthorized".</p>
              </div>
              <p>
                  <span class="doc-param-annotation">
                    <b>TYPE:</b>
                      <code><a class="autorefs autorefs-external" href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/functions.html#int" target="_blank" rel="noopener">int</a></code>
                  </span>
                  <span class="doc-param-default">
                    <b>DEFAULT:</b>
                      <code>401</code>
                  </span>
              </p>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="doc-section-item">
            <td>
                <code>detail</code>
            </td>
            <td class="doc-param-details">
              <div class="doc-md-description">
                <p>Detailed error message. If <code>None</code>, uses a default
message based on the status code.</p>
              </div>
              <p>
                  <span class="doc-param-annotation">
                    <b>TYPE:</b>
                      <code><a class="autorefs autorefs-external" href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html#str" target="_blank" rel="noopener">str</a> | None</code>
                  </span>
                  <span class="doc-param-default">
                    <b>DEFAULT:</b>
                      <code>None</code>
                  </span>
              </p>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="doc-section-item">
            <td>
                <code>headers</code>
            </td>
            <td class="doc-param-details">
              <div class="doc-md-description">
                <p>Additional HTTP headers to include in the error response.</p>
              </div>
              <p>
                  <span class="doc-param-annotation">
                    <b>TYPE:</b>
                      <code><a class="autorefs autorefs-external" title="&lt;code&gt;collections.abc.Mapping&lt;/code&gt;" href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/collections.abc.html#collections.abc.Mapping" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Mapping</a>[<a class="autorefs autorefs-external" href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html#str" target="_blank" rel="noopener">str</a>, <a class="autorefs autorefs-external" href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html#str" target="_blank" rel="noopener">str</a>] | None</code>
                  </span>
                  <span class="doc-param-default">
                    <b>DEFAULT:</b>
                      <code>None</code>
                  </span>
              </p>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </tbody>
    </table>


<details class="example" open>
  <summary>Example</summary>
  <p>Default:
<div class="language-python highlight"><pre><span></span><code><span id="__span-0-1"><a id="__codelineno-0-1" name="__codelineno-0-1" href="#__codelineno-0-1"></a><span class="k">raise</span> <span class="n">HTTPException</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span><span id="__span-0-2"><a id="__codelineno-0-2" name="__codelineno-0-2" href="#__codelineno-0-2"></a><span class="c1"># HTTPException(status_code=401, detail=&#39;Unauthorized&#39;)</span>
</span></code></pre></div></p>
<p>Add headers:
<div class="language-python highlight"><pre><span></span><code><span id="__span-1-1"><a id="__codelineno-1-1" name="__codelineno-1-1" href="#__codelineno-1-1"></a><span class="k">raise</span> <span class="n">HTTPException</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s2">&quot;X-Custom-Header&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">&quot;Custom Value&quot;</span><span class="p">})</span>
</span><span id="__span-1-2"><a id="__codelineno-1-2" name="__codelineno-1-2" href="#__codelineno-1-2"></a><span class="c1"># HTTPException(status_code=401, detail=&#39;Unauthorized&#39;, headers={&quot;WWW-Authenticate&quot;: &quot;Bearer&quot;})</span>
</span></code></pre></div></p>
<p>Custom error:
<div class="language-python highlight"><pre><span></span><code><span id="__span-2-1"><a id="__codelineno-2-1" name="__codelineno-2-1" href="#__codelineno-2-1"></a><span class="k">raise</span> <span class="n">HTTPException</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">status_code</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">404</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">detail</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&quot;Not found&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></code></pre></div></p>
</details>
